subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong has acknowledged the 2009 Tour de France title is out of his reach.  But he is sure he'll make his best effort next year, with a new team.
snippet: Lance Armstrong has acknowledged the 2009 Tour de France title is out of his reach.  But he is sure he'll make his best effort next year, with a new team.
